content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/xJdFFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Asset Manager\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an inventory instrument that helps effectively track and manage IT assets and resources (hardware, software). Service Desk Processing Center is responsible for granting access to the application. Read article  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/8pdFFw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access to Asset Manager\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn how this is done.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Ask your mentor to practice requests for granting access to Asset Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
